summary: This is an email from an Assistant U.S. Attorney in the Southern District of New York requesting Relativity database access for a cc'd individual to both the Epstein and Maxwell case databases. It indicates ongoing case management and evidence review in August 2020.

persons.name: Assistant U.S. Attorney
persons.context: The sender of the email requesting database access for the Epstein and Maxwell cases on behalf of a cc'd individual.

events.title: Database Access Request
events.description: An Assistant U.S. Attorney requests Relativity database access for a cc'd individual to review evidence in the Epstein and Maxwell cases.

keyFacts: The U.S. Attorney's Office was actively managing evidence databases for both the Epstein and Maxwell cases as of August 2020.
Access to a consolidated 'Epstein database' and a separate 'new Maxwell database' on the Relativity platform was being coordinated.
The communication shows ongoing prosecutorial work and evidence review years after Epstein's arrest and death.
